General.Name: Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc
General.Description: Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. provides design and contract manufacturing services for semiconductor and TFT-LCD equipment manufacturing, and integrated system equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company's services and products include equipment components, modules, solar energy equipment, and total systems used in the semiconductor and TFT-LCD industries. Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Chu-Nan, Taiwan.
